subject: fs_homepath/basepath mixed
description:
after i build etl from git i received this error message.

startet with command: etl
--- error message
FS_InitFilesystem: Couldn't load default.cfg - I am missing essential files!
Verify your installation and make sure genuine ET files
- mp_bin.pk3
- pak0.pk3
- pak1.pk3
- pak2.pk3
are located in 'etmain' of fs_homepath.
---

Then startet with: etl +set fs_homepath /usr/local/games/etl
--- error message
FS_CreatePath: failed to create path "/usr/local/games/etl/legacy"
---

Then startet with:  etl +set fs_basepath /usr/local/games/etl
Everything fine, game startet.

something seems to be messed up with path as i need to set basepath and even tells me wrong solution.
